trans-unit.source: Provides information about the workflow association (that is, the <c>Microsoft.SharePoint.Workflow.SPWorkflowAssociation</c>) that is represented by a node in **Server Explorer**.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关由服务器资源管理器中的节点表示的工作流关联（即 <c>Microsoft.SharePoint.Workflow.SPWorkflowAssociation</c>）的信息。

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve an <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.IWorkflowAssociationNodeInfo> object from the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.IAnnotatedObject.Annotations%2A> property of each <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNode> that represents a workflow association.
trans-unit.target: 你可以检索<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.IWorkflowAssociationNodeInfo>对象<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.IAnnotatedObject.Annotations%2A>每个属性<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNode>表示工作流关联。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Extending the SharePoint Connections Node in Server Explorer](/visualstudio/sharepoint/extending-the-sharepoint-connections-node-in-server-explorer.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[扩展服务器资源管理器中的 SharePoint 连接节点](/visualstudio/sharepoint/extending-the-sharepoint-connections-node-in-server-explorer.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the ID of the workflow association.
trans-unit.target: 获取工作流关联的 ID。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the workflow association.
Gets the ID of the <c>Microsoft.SharePoint.SPList</c> that the <c>Microsoft.SharePoint.Workflow.SPWorkflowAssociation</c> is attached to.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <c>Microsoft.SharePoint.Workflow.SPWorkflowAssociation</c> 附加到的 <c>Microsoft.SharePoint.SPList</c> 的 ID。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the <c>Microsoft.SharePoint.SPList</c> that the <c>Microsoft.SharePoint.Workflow.SPWorkflowAssociation</c> is attached to.
Gets the name of the workflow association.
trans-unit.target: 获取工作流关联的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the workflow association.
